name: Tank Captain
description:
Grab a friend to play this 2D multiplayer  tank game where you battle with friends to win the matches against each other. This is a prototype release and I'm currently adding much more things to the game. If possible I would appreciate if you could give feedback about the game or a donation to support my work!  Also if you are interested in getting this games unity source code for a price let me know in the comments!

Controls: WSAD to move and Left mouse button to shoot
